issue.title: [C++] Speed up GcsFileSystem tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15056](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15056). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The tests spend too much time starting and shutting down the testbench.  A single testbench should be enough for all the tests.  May require some helpers to use a different bucket in each test or something similar.
